alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 4:41PM CST until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Little Mound Creek Near Mathis Road affecting Harris County. For the Cypress Creek...including Mathis Road...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Mound Creek Near Mathis Road. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:35 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 205.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:35 PM CST Tuesday was 205.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 206.3 feet this evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 205.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1045 AM CST.
